Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Gechuang Dongzhi Technology Co., Ltd. was established in 2018 and has three core industries: semiconductor display, new energy photovoltaic and semiconductor materials, and intelligent terminals. Gechuang Dongzhi adheres to the "production site-oriented" research and development direction, uses standardized platforms, industrial applications and industry solutions to meet the needs of manufacturing enterprises for intelligence, and is committed to the research and development and innovation of factory intelligent operating systems.

Relying on core technical capabilities such as AI, cloud computing, and big data, Gechuang Dongzhi adheres to the strategy of integrating software and hardware, uses software and algorithms to drive the intelligent upgrade of equipment and edge control hardware, and develops an industrial intelligent product system that integrates software and hardware.
